hint-modal.expInDayHintModalText: Right bar -> Ranking -> Detailed info -> last date

about.intro: Welcome to our SPA application designed specifically for Lineage 2 players. Whether you're a new player or a seasoned veteran, our app provides essential tools to help you optimize your gameplay and make more informed decisions.

firstFeatures.title: Attribute Damage Penalty Calculator
firstFeatures.text: Easily calculate the penalties your character faces when dealing with different attribute types and levels. This helps you adjust your gear and maximize damage output.

secondFeatures.title: Currency Value Converter
secondFeatures.text: Planning to trade or buy items? Use our currency converter to instantly calculate the current market value of Lineage 2 coins and other currencies in-game.

thirdFeatures.title: Optimal Gear Boost Calculator
thirdFeatures.text: Unsure which gear upgrades will give you the best value for your Adena? Simply input your current gear, and our calculator will provide an analysis of which items offer the most damage boost per investment, showing you the cost of gaining that extra 1% damage.

fourthFeatures.title: Experience calculator
fourthFeatures.text: This calculator lets you quickly determine how many days are left until you reach the next level.

about.stayConnected: Want to get more tips and guides? Check out my YouTube channel for weekly updates on Lineage 2, including farming guides, leveling tips, and event details.
about.support: Love the app? Support its development by buying me a coffee!
